title: European Highroof campout 27/28/29 June '14 + pre 67 bus!

posts.content:
What to expect!

A back to basic campout with the main goal to get the biggest highroof line up ever!!
2 fields next to each other on a beautiful private location in Maidenhead (UK)
The program is simple, park up.. relax.. and socialise..
Families are more then welcome!

Saturday eve there will be a venison roast included in the entrance price (±£10-15 for the weekend/adult (kids are free)) the price is to cover the roast and toilets (yet TBC).
I will try my best to keep it as cheap as possible, any profit will go to a charity. (Charity organisation TBC)
The roast on saturday eve is followed by one massive (huge) central campfire.
I'll try and organise a tour on sunday (±1,5hr) to a local airfield to potentially get a line up in front of classic airplanes.. (TBC)

Guidelines are simple

-There won't be any trophies, commercial banners, racing, trading or sponsors!!
-No vehicles other than those mentioned in the image will be allowed on the property, however, I added a small clause for people who
wish to join the weekend, they're welcome with a tent!
-Other vehicles can park on the road/curb - no lines.
-Toilets will be available as are water taps but no electric hook up's.
-Dogs are allowed but must be kept on a lead at all times (there's sheep, goose and chickens on the farm) and nr2's need to be cleaned up immediately.
-Litter goes in provided bins
-No stereos after 10.30pm (neighbors!) instead we have the main campfire which will last untill the last man stands
-Autojumble is allowed to a max of 3 sq/m per vehicle and we'll ask a economical £1 fee
-BBQ's are ok but must be kept off the ground, no open fires!

Gates open
-friday 1pm-8pm
-saturday 9am-8pm
-sunday 9am-3pm show finishes at 5pm
(After closing time, you will still be able to enter the property via ringing my mobile not at silly 'o clock tho!)

Address is Paley street - Maidenhead!

That's more or less what to expect, if it is a success we may repeat this every (2) year..

To be able to get an idea who we can expect please copy/paste and add your name to the below!


Highroofs

- Stephan ('65 + '63)
